  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    State
    Abstract class representing state of the appliance.
    StateBroken
    StateBroken represents a state of a home appliance when it is broken.
    StateIdle
    StateIdle represents a state of a home appliance when it is idle.
    StateOff
    StateOff represents a state of a home appliance when it is off.
    StateOn
    StateOn represents a state of a home appliance when it is on.
